title: Assur Archive 37
description: In an unspecified area with private houses in c6, excavators found a small archive of 5 clay tablets. The available datings are from the 7th century BC. The archive, belonging to Nanunu, consists of loan documents and a purchase agreement.

properties.description: Representative locations of the Neo-Assyrian archive at Assur on the basis of Peders√©n 1987 Plan(s) 62.
properties.title: Plan location of Assur Archive 37
